description:
The Easy-Ride pedal conversion kit turns the Strider 14x into a pedal bike, complete with a coaster brake. Kid-friendly pedals are just the right size for both striding and pedaling. The option to do both helps them gain enough momentum to start pedaling.

  • Fits Strider 14x Balance bike
  • Narrow pedals suit little feet
  • Coaster brakes control speed and makes epic skids easy
  • Chain guard keeps the drivetrain safely covered and clean
  • Easy installation uses only 2 screws
name: Strider Easy-Ride Pedal Conversion Kit - Children
